summary: A little Indian girl, heiress to a fortune in oil, is kidnapped.
cast: John Wayne|Sheila Terry|Shirley Jean Rickert|Jack Rockwell|Yakima Canutt|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Jay Wilsey|Philip Kieffer|Harry L. Fraser|Frank Hall Crane|Earl Dwire|Billy Franey|Herman Hack|George Morrell|Artie Ortego|Eddie Parker|Tex Phelps|Allen Pomeroy
director: Director: Harry L. Fraser (as Harry Fraser)
title: Bajo el cielo de Arizona
